OpenSearchDescription.LongName: World Covid 19 Data | Covid 19 World Data
OpenSearchDescription.Description: The client application's role is to contain the UI and display it to the user. World-covid-19-data-CRA is an application to display data of cases, deaths, and recovers for each country and are known in the world, from the 8 different APIs.
OpenSearchDescription.Tags: covid, covid 19, covid-19, world-covid, world-covid-19-data-cra, pandemia
